title: Hour 2: Best in the NFL
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. has a bone to pick with Chris "Mad Dog" Russo. Freddie Coleman and Brian Windhorst return to discuss which team has more questions than answers: the Brooklyn Nets or the Philadelphia 76ers? Courtney Cronin joins the debate with her take on if Shohei Ohtani or Aaron Judge will be the most entertaining player in this season's home run race. The crew also discusses how many titles are in the future for this Golden State Warriors team. Booger McFarland joins in the fun as they debate which team in the NFL has the best roster going into this season and if the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' success is determined by another Super Bowl title.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Which team has the best roster in the NFL?
